CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaStream relative to Luminara?
SRP.A: NovaStream is {below} Luminara in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to Luminara?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {below} Luminara in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing OracleFeed relative to Luminara?
SRP.A: OracleFeed is {below} Luminara in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total ad revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total ad revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {NovaStream}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst Online's maximum Ad Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst Online's maximum Ad Revenue is in {2007}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is EchoWave's maximum Ad Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: EchoWave's maximum Ad Revenue is in {2007}.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1995, was the average total Ad Revenue higher or lower than between 1989 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total ad revenue between 1989 and 1995 was {lower} than between 1989 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Ad Revenue in 1989 higher or lower than in 2007?
NC.A: The total ad revenue in 1989 was {lower} than in 2007.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1993, was the average total Ad Revenue higher or lower than between 2003 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total ad revenue between 1986 and 1993 was {lower} than between 2003 and 2005.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 2002, did the total Ad Revenue experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total ad revenue between 1988 and 2002 was {larger} than between 1987 and 2006.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst Online} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did AetherNet and OracleFeed first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: AetherNet and OracleFeed first exchanged leading positions in {1987}.
